Articles.Content:
To morrow I'll be doing a ksp livestream. Sending a kethane mining rig to Duna. Ran out of fuel and need to get more out there and 30 somthing lanches to get fuel up there isin't entertaining. I'll also be designing a maned rover for duna also.

Edit: forgot the link

http://www.twitch.tv/leax256

Edited June 2, 2013 by leax256
this livestream is starting in live 5-10 min.

not seeing anything

An un expected event occured. The stream is now starting.

I appoligize to anyone who wanted to watch the stream today but was unable due to me not actually streaming. There was an unexpected "everything that is clean is actually dirty so let's cut all internet and get house clean" event that happened today so I was unable to stream. I will try to make it up to you as soon as I can.

Ok guys and gals. I'll be doing a stream in ~1 & 1/2 hours. It will last untill either Everyone leave or I drop from exaustion...which ever comes first.

for those that don't look above... twich.tv/leax256
